modName: Lotr Friends of the Fellowship Eomer
summary:
Friends of the Fellowship Eomer

This mod adds a follower inspired in the Character Éomer
from the Lotr Movie.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a follower inspired in the Character Éomer
from the Lotr Movie.
You will need to find him; but you will see it is very easy!

Éomer

Race: Nord
Voice type: Male Nord
Class: CWSoldierClass

Inventory:

Eomer Outfit:

Armor Guard Cuirass Whiterun
Armor Steel Boots A
Armor Steel Gauntlets A

Armor Guard Helmet Full Whiterun
Armor Gurad Shield Whiterun

Steel Sword

Misc:

5 Torch
50 Gold

Food: 

Bread
Honningbrew Mead
Venison Cooked

Mods Required

Every city have various guard oufits TS Edition by TS
(If you don\'t have this mod or don\'t want to use it; Eomer 
will have the normal Whiterun guard outfit.)

Recommended:

LOTR Shield pack by Lancelotx999
JaySuS Swords by JaySuS

Installation:

Just place the Eomer.esp file in your skyrim data folder 
and activated in the data files menu or in your mod manager
author: Sergeynest
